channel.title: Middle East on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Middle East on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: No, Hannah, That Wasn’t Brave (Guest Column)
item.description: True courage would have meant calling for peace, for coexistence, for the humanity of both Israelis and Palestinians, even if it risked boos instead of applause, writes Israeli activist Hen Mazzig.

item.title: No, Hannah, That Wasn’t Brave (Guest Column)
item.description: True courage would have meant calling for peace, for coexistence, for the humanity of both Israelis and Palestinians, even if it risked boos instead of applause, writes Israeli activist Hen Mazzig.

item.title: The United Arab Emirates Releases a Tiny But Powerful AI Model
item.description: K2 Think compares well with reasoning models from OpenAI and DeepSeek but is smaller and more efficient, say researchers based in Abu Dhabi.

item.title: The United Arab Emirates Releases a Tiny But Powerful AI Model
item.description: K2 Think compares well with reasoning models from OpenAI and DeepSeek but is smaller and more efficient, say researchers based in Abu Dhabi.

item.title: Leaked Memo: Anthropic CEO Says the Company Will Pursue Gulf State Investments After All
item.description: “Unfortunately, I think ‘No bad person should ever benefit from our success’ is a pretty difficult principle to run a business on,” wrote Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei in a note to staff obtained by WIRE

item.title: Leaked Memo: Anthropic CEO Says the Company Will Pursue Gulf State Investments After All
item.description: “Unfortunately, I think ‘No bad person should ever benefit from our success’ is a pretty difficult principle to run a business on,” wrote Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei in a note to staff obtained by WIRE
